function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction of public services and limited opportunities for socializing can lead to an increase in stress, anxiety, and mental health issues.","Impact":"Increased burden on the health system and decreased community well-being.","Mitigation":"Investment in alternative forms of social support and mental health services, promotion of virtual socializing and support networks.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, virtual community engagement tools, mental health apps.","People":"Citizens and communities.","Owner":"Government, local authorities, mental health organizations."},{"Description":"Budget cuts to parks lead to a decline in the quality and quantity of green space.","Impact":"Diminished community health and well-being, increased strain on existing green spaces.","Mitigation":"Advocacy for increased park funding, community-led initiatives for green space maintenance, utilization of technology for virtual green space experiences.","Technologies":"Virtual reality nature experiences, online green space monitoring and maintenance tools.","People":"Residents, park users, community organizations.","Owner":"Local authorities, advocacy groups, community organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of proper planning, designing, and managing of green space reduces its positive impact on community health.","Impact":"Loss of potential health benefits for community members, increased reliance on medical services.","Mitigation":"Investment in landscape architecture and urban planning, community involvement in green space design and management, promotion of sustainable green space practices.","Technologies":"Smart city planning tools, GIS mapping for green space planning, community engagement platforms.","People":"Community members, urban planners, landscape architects.","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planning departments, landscape architecture firms."}]}
